    • Constructor Detail

      • InventoryBuilder

        public InventoryBuilder​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        GameInventory gameInventory)
        Creates a new chainable builder for the specified Player and GameInventory
        Parameters:
        player - the Player this GameInventory will be displayed to upon calling open()
        gameInventory - the GameInventory to build from
        See Also:
        GameInventory

    • Method Detail

      • sortItems

        public InventoryBuilder sortItems​(java.util.Comparator<ItemBuilder> comparator)
        Sorts the items using the given Comparator
        Parameters:
        comparator - the Comparator to use for comparing items
        Returns:
        this class for chaining

      • page

        public InventoryBuilder page​(int number)
        Sets this builder instance to the specified page without opening it to the Player

        Next Page, Previous Page, and Back button items are automatically added accordingly, so there's no need to manually add them per-page

        Parameters:
        number - the page to go to
        Returns:
        this class for chaining
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when number is > the max page and < 0

      • search

        public InventoryBuilder search​(java.lang.String search)
        Searches the names of the items for the given keyword

        Calling this will reset the page to 0. This is to prevent exceptions that would occur if the current page didn't exist after the search keyword changed.
        Setting the value to "" will clear the current search keyword.

        Parameters:
        search - the keyword to search item names for
        Returns:
        this class for chaining

      • nextPage

        public InventoryBuilder nextPage​()
        Makes a cleaner call to page(int number + 1)
        Returns:
        this class for chaining

      • previousPage

        public InventoryBuilder previousPage​()
        Makes a cleaner call to page(int number - 1)
        Returns:
        this class for chaining

      • open

        public void open​()
        Opens this GameInventory for the current Player

        Uses the current InventoryBuilder instance Opens to the page set by page(int number), or the first page if unset
